title: Medium of Instruction Letter
content:
Heyo, 2022 grad here. 

Iâ€™m currently applying for masters abroad, and universities in Singapore are asking for a medium of instruction letter from PES University. 

Does anyone know whom I can reach out to? Any email? Or should I visit campus?

comments.body: Your transcript will have the medium of instruction mentioned on the top.

No problem. 

Also dropping this here for your benefit: there's a discord server that comprises PES kids who are either applying for MS or alumni who are currently studying/have studied abroad. Let me know if you'd like to join.
DM me, I'll send the link. Don't want to share a public link here.
Is the discord open for PES alumini who're heading out this fall for their masters?
Yep. Tbh it's open to all PES students and alumni, just that all discussions on it are focused on Masters related stuff
Can you send me the link as well. Would love to join as im planning to apply for masters now.
